scenario.title: Requesting an Extension on an Assignment
scenario.description: You are a student in Professor Martinez's Advanced Writing course. You have been ill for three days and cannot complete the research paper due this Friday. Request a one-week extension.
scenario.purpose: Request a one-week extension on the research paper
keyPoints: Explain your illness and its impact
Specify how much additional time you need
Mention your commitment to quality work
Offer to provide a doctor note if required

modelAnswer:
Dear Professor Martinez,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to respectfully request a one-week extension on the research paper due this Friday, March 22nd.

Unfortunately, I have been seriously ill with the flu since Monday and have been unable to work on my assignments. I have a doctor's note confirming my condition, which I am happy to provide upon request.

The additional week would allow me to recover fully and produce the quality of work your course deserves.

Thank you very much for your consideration.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

rubric.description: Clearly explains the reason and includes all key points.
Proper email format with greeting, body, and polite closing.
Formal, polite register appropriate for writing to a professor.
